metadata.title: CVE-2023-28466 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: do_tls_getsockopt in net/tls/tls_main.c in the Linux kernel through 6.2.6lacks a lock_sock call, leading to a race condition (with a resultantuse-after-free or NULL pointer dereference).

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
